article.title: Dewolfe To Direct OPNAV ISR
article.author: Henry Kenyon

tags.tag: Office of the Chief of Naval Operations

article.text: Capt. Dewolfe H. Miller III, USN, has been selected for promotion to rear admiral and assignment as director, intelligence, surveillance and reconnaissance capabilities, N-2/N-6/F-2, Office of the Chief of Naval Operations, Washington, D.C.
